name: Yorkshire Puds
ingredients:
1. 200g plain flour
2. 3 eggs 
3. 300mlmilk
4. 3 tbsp vegetable oil
steps:
1. Put the flour and some seasoning into a large bowl.
2. Stir in eggs, one at a time.
3. Whisk in milk until you have a smooth batter.
4. Chill in the fridge for at least 30 minutes.
5. Heat oven to 220C/gas mark 7.
6. Pour the oil into the holes of a 8-hole muffin tin.
7. Heat tin in the oven for 5 minutes.
8. Ladle the batter mix into the tin.
9. Bake for 30 minutes until well browned and risen.
